values.value: FedRAMP IR-4 (Incident Handling) requires organizations to establish incident response capabilities including incident detection, analysis, containment, and recovery. All security incidents must be tracked, documented, and reported within required timeframes.
FedRAMP Moderate Baseline IR-4 - Incident Handling, IR-5 - Incident Monitoring

1. Enable comprehensive audit logging (Field History, Setup Audit Trail, Event Monitoring). 2. Configure automated alerts for high-risk security events (unauthorized access, privilege escalation). 3. Document incident response procedures and assign incident response team. 4. Maintain incident log with timestamps, affected systems, and remediation actions. 5. Conduct quarterly incident response tabletop exercises. 6. Report security incidents to FedRAMP PMO within required timeframes.
